context.p: To mark the text you select in a document:

step.cmd: Select the text you want to highlight.

stepresult.note: To mark multiple parts of the document you are editing, press and hold Ctrl (Meta on Mac OS) and using you cursor select the parts you want to highlight.

step.cmd: Click the small arrow next to the Highlight icon and select the color that you want to use for highlighting.
Click the Highlight icon to exit the highlighting mode.
